description: Cheque Cancellation or Stop Request - Used to request the cancellation or stop payment of one or more cheques

scenarios.name: CBPR+ Fraud Prevention Stop Request
scenarios.description: Urgent cheque stop request due to suspected fraud with CBPR+ compliance

scenarios.name: CBPR+ Lost Cheque Cancellation
scenarios.description: Cancellation request for lost cross-border cheque with CBPR+ compliance
